name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_focus
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.focus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.focus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What the service request is about, when it is not about the subject of record
element.definition: The actual focus of a service request when it is not the subject of record representing something or someone associated with the subject such as a spouse, parent, fetus, or donor. The focus of a service request could also be an existing condition,  an intervention, the subject's diet,  another service request on the subject,  or a body structure such as tumor or implanted device.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.focus` has no related element in R4B:ServiceRequest `ServiceRequest.focus` has no related element in R4B:ServiceRequest `ServiceRequest.focus` has no related element in R4B:ServiceRequest
